semantic_identifier: [GOLD-102]: Pin positioning block version per recommendation to prevent drift on Marketing updates
title: Pin positioning block version per recommendation to prevent drift on Marketing updates

sections.text: Update messaging/recommendation generation to always use an explicit positioningBlockVersionId (from stored Customer_Analyzer versions) rather than resolving to “latest” at runtime. Persist the chosen version id on the generated recommendation/message record so re-renders, edits, and follow-up sequences remain consistent even after Marketing publishes a new version. If a requested version is missing/unavailable, fail with a clear error and fallback to the last known pinned version (no silent auto-upgrade).
